item.title: Why Blog?
item.description: Intro Why Blog? How to blog? My List of DS Blogs & Twitter Accounts Intro At this year‚Äôs RStudio Conf David Robinson discussed the importance of sharing work publicly in his talk ‚ÄúThe unreasonable effectiveness of public work.‚Äù. He attributed much of his own personal, professional success to the habit of sharing his work and encouraged others to adopt the habit. I had long considered writing a blog documenting much of my work.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I'm Mark Druffel! I'm a data science neophyte, I mutate ‚òï + üç∫ into R code. Motivation Over the last 5 years I have found a passion for data analysis and software development. I set up this blog as a tool to reflect on what I learn during my journey and share it with the community. I hope the content will be useful to other newcomers and encourage collaboration. If you have any feedback or want to discuss any of the topics please feel free to reach out!
